Page1

Justin Snyder

Justin is a founding advisor at DecentraNet. An entrepreneur, attorney, and leading designer, Justin uses sound business practices and smart design aesthetics to create impactful experiences for brands, products, and events. He works with companies in the blockchain, sustainability, entertainment, digital collectibles and ecommerce sectors, and is currently developing solutions to align technology, art, education, and spirituality. Justin holds a Juris Doctor in International Law from American University, Washington College of Law, and a Bachelors of Arts in Economics from West Virginia University.



Crystal Twin

Your digital twin serving as a gateway to the new digital world of peer-to-peer experiences.
